title: Alain Connes
summary: Alain Connes (French: [alɛ̃ kɔn]; born 1 April 1947) is a French mathematician, and a theoretical physicist, known for his contributions to the study of operator algebras and noncommutative geometry. He is a professor at the Collège de Francecode: fra promoted to code: fr , Institut des Hautes Études Scientifiquescode: fra promoted to code: fr , Ohio State University and Vanderbilt University. He was awarded the Fields Medal in 1982.
